page.title: 09Bonne Nuit Bay, St. John
page.content:
Bonne Nuit bay is a {fishing harbour used by both professional and amateur fishermen which tourists find very attractive.
There are several varieties of fish to be caught from the pier. There are fishing trips for the public which take one past {Le Cheval Guillaume.} This is a large rock about half a kilometre north-east from the pier. The bay has a rocky beach with little sand.Families go swimming and children enjoy jumping off the pier.
There are{legends}about Bonne Nuit and Cheval rock, one of which informs us that if a stone is skimmed aiming for the rock,the number of times it bounces is the number of years that the person throwing the stone has to wait before marrying.
